#卡特编写2006.12.05，QQ：88621517

########## 当物品栏小于1个空位##
block ItemSpace < 1
	EndWindow 10000
	
########## 物品含3W的时候##########
block Gold >= 10000
	AddGold -10000
	Giveleak1Item (652176%1,18658%1,18699%3,652160%4,652161%4,652162%4,652163%4,652164%4,652165%4,652166%4,652167%4,600002%100,600202%100,600402%100,600602%100,600802%100,601002%100,601202%100,601400%100,601600%100,601800%100,602001%100,602200%100,602400%100,602601%100,602800%100,652168%1500,652169%1500,652170%1500,652171%1500,652172%1500,652173%1500,652174%1500,652175%1500,18447%200,18958%200,652177%86264)
	EndWindow 120133

########## 当物品栏小于1个空位##
block Gold < 10000
	EndWindow 120134
